name: Heart Attacks the Game
description:
Heart Attacks! is the game where you play as a man's heart as he runs for his life from a weird and wonderful set of foes.

Can you make it to the finish line!?

Key Features:

- Play with one hand. Do literally anything you like with the other!
- Simple and fun gameplay.
- No IAPs

From the creators of MAXIMUM CAR, 8-BIT WATERSLIDE, PIPE LORD and FAST FOOD RAMPAGE!

Ancient Games DS are a small indie game studio based in London, UK.
